| Property           | Attribute            | Description                         | Type     | Default                            |
| ------------------ | -------------------- | ----------------------------------- | -------- | ---------------------------------- |
| `colorGalaxyS8`    | `color-galaxy-s-8`   | Samsung S8 color.                   | `string` | `'black'`                          |
| `colorGooglePixel` | `color-google-pixel` | Google Pixel color.                 | `string` | `'silver'`                         |
| `colorIpadPro`     | `color-ipad-pro`     | iPad Pro color.                     | `string` | `'silver'`                         |
| `colorIphone8`     | `color-iphone-8`     | iPhone 8 color.                     | `string` | `'silver'`                         |
| `colorMacbook`     | `color-macbook`      | MacBook color.                      | `string` | `'silver'`                         |
| `colorMacbookPro`  | `color-macbook-pro`  | MacBook Pro color.                  | `string` | `'silver'`                         |
| `display`          | `display`            |                                     | `string` | `'inline-block'`                   |
| `imagePosition`    | `image-position`     |                                     | `string` | `'50% 50%'`                        |
| `src`              | `src`                | Image src if no inner slot is used. | `string` | `'https://picsum.photos/400/1200'` |
| `type`             | `type`               | Device type.                        | `string` | `'iphone-8'`                       |
